text: The Opel Mokka is a car from the German carmaker Opel since 2012. The Mokka is a subcompact crossover SUV, and rides on GM's Gamma platform, which is the same platform the Chevrolet Aveo/Sonic and Spark are built on. The Mokka is sold as the Buick Encore and Chevrolet Trax in North America and is sold as a Vauxhall in the UK. The Opel/Vauxhall versions were facelifted in 2016 and were renamed Mokka X. It entered its second generation in 2020 and is now called the Mokka again, it offers petrol, diesel and electric versions. Mokka Category:2010s automobiles
title: Opel Mokka
